activities: Best Western International, Inc. (BWI) processes personal information as required in order to conduct its lodging business related activities including facilitating the operation and maintenance of a central reservations system and a frequency marketing program known generally as "Best Western Rewards®."  Further details are provided in the company's privacy policy.  BWI also collects the personally identifiable information of Best Western Travel Card® purchasers and users.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For unresolved complaints under the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles, BWI has agreed to participate in the BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.
